howItWorks.title: How Training Works
howItWorks.content: In the training mode, you can practice all quiz questions released for practice one question at a time. Questions are selected using a spaced repetition algorithm to optimize your learning experience. If there are currently no questions due, you can still train, but your answers will not affect your leaderboard score or the spaced repetition algorithm.

leagues.title: Leagues and Rankings
leagues.content: You can participate in a leaderboard that shows your score compared to other students. There are 5 leagues (Bronze, Silver, Gold, Diamond, and Master), each with its own leaderboard. You can change the settings for the training mode in the user settings.

scoring.title: Scoring System
scoring.content: Answer questions correctly to collect points and rank up to higher leagues. The more often a question is answered correctly in a row, the more points you earn for it.
